turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Sovremenny-class destroyer.
turn.1: What are the armaments of the Sovremenny-class destroyer?
turn.2: The ship is outfitted with the Raduga Moskit anti-ship missile system with two four-cell launchers installed port and starboard of the forward island and set at an angle about 15°.
turn.3: What else is significant about the armaments of this ship?
turn.4: The ship carries a total of eight Moskit 3M80E missiles, NATO designation SS-N-22 Sunburn.
turn.5: What are the capabilities of these missiles?
turn.6: The missile is sea-skimming with a velocity of Mach 2.5, armed with a high-explosive or a nuclear 200 kt warhead.
